text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cc184cfb09161b3bbc7d5d8859a18e812367d19c|patch 8.1.2293: join adds trailing space when second line is empty>
patch 8.1.2293: join adds trailing space when second line is empty

Problem:    Join adds trailing space when second line is empty. (Brennan
            Vincent)
Solution:   Do not add a trailing space.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2293: join adds trailing space when second line is empty · vim/vim@cc184cf
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2293: join adds trailing space when second line is empty · vim/vim@cc184cf
attachments.text: Problem: Join adds trailing space when second line is empty. (Brennan Vincent) Solution: Do not add a trailing space.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cbee635eee3007db97646ddb9f211a1d4966eb2a|patch 8.1.2294: cursor pos wrong with concealing and search causes a …>
patch 8.1.2294: cursor pos wrong with concealing and search causes a scroll

Problem:    Cursor position wrong when characters are concealed and asearch
            causes a scroll.
Solution:   Fix the cursor column in a concealed line after window scroll.
            (closes #5215, closes #5012)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2294: cursor pos wrong with concealing and search causes a … · vim/vim@cbee635
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2294: cursor pos wrong with concealing and search causes a … · vim/vim@cbee635
attachments.text: …scroll Problem: Cursor position wrong when characters are concealed and asearch causes a scroll. Solution: Fix the cursor column in a concealed line after window scroll. ...

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4eb7dae255abc271cf313d4c75839577f1424183|patch 8.1.2295: if buffer of popup is in another window cursorline si…>
patch 8.1.2295: if buffer of popup is in another window cursorline sign shows

Problem:    If buffer of popup is in another window cursorline sign shows.
Solution:   Check the group of the sign.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2295: if buffer of popup is in another window cursorline si… · vim/vim@4eb7dae
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2295: if buffer of popup is in another window cursorline si… · vim/vim@4eb7dae
attachments.text: …gn shows Problem: If buffer of popup is in another window cursorline sign shows. Solution: Check the group of the sign.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/58e32ab503141e049c0e8c504a379bff8eddffdd|patch 8.1.2296: text properties are not combined with syntax by default>
patch 8.1.2296: text properties are not combined with syntax by default

Problem:    Text properties are not combined with syntax by default.
Solution:   Make it work as documented. (closes #5190)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2296: text properties are not combined with syntax by default · vim/vim@58e32ab

attachments.text: Problem: Text properties are not combined with syntax by default. Solution: Make it work as documented. (closes #5190)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d6a98a3a9768568b668f91a53267b36f86b84466|patch 8.1.2297: the ex_vimgrep() function is too long>
patch 8.1.2297: the ex_vimgrep() function is too long

Problem:    The ex_vimgrep() function is too long.
Solution:   Split it in three parts. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5211)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2297: the ex_vimgrep() function is too long · vim/vim@d6a98a3
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2297: the ex_vimgrep() function is too long · vim/vim@d6a98a3
attachments.text: Problem: The ex_vimgrep() function is too long. Solution: Split it in three parts. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5211)
